page.title: 15A Five Year Old's Life.
page.content: I live in Fair Hill. I am just five. It was a big field before the houss and bungalows were made and we used to have fairs twice a year here. They were held the last Wednesday in April and 17th November. The last one was in November 1939. The field was called Home Field. There are 19 homes here. A few days it rains and quite a lot of days it is sunny. There are only a few cars going up and down this way. We go out quite a lot. We go each Sunday to see Daddy at work on the Mendips. We like it very much up here. I have got a lot of toys. I like my toys very much. Each day I come home from school, I play with my toys until tea time. The teas I like are fish and chips or lamb chops. I have got so many toys that I have not enough time to play with them all.
